        Description copied from class: GameSearchAlgorithm
        Evaluates given game state associated with the maximizing player.
        Specified by:
        doEvaluateMaxState in class GameSearchAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        gameState - given game state
        alpha - lower bound on game value known for given game state
        beta - upper bound on game value known for given game state
        depth - current depth
        depthLimit - depth limit
        Returns:
        calculated game value (or null if time limit is reached)
